info.author: Brendan Gillatt
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Multimedia :: Sound/Audio :: CD Audio :: CD Playing
info.description: A Python plugin for Winamp. Takes the output of the WinLirc daemon and sends the required commands to Winamp. A modified version of the Python Winamp Control is used to send the commands.
info.name: pywinlirc
info.summary: A Winamp controller written in Python, designed to be used with WinLirc
info.html_description: A Python plugin for Winamp. Takes the output of the WinLirc daemon and sends the required commands to Winamp. A modified version of the Python Winamp Control is used to send the commands.
